documents.document: @Tweetinggoddess Pity, but have just followed @mariekeflament Thanks for thinking of me! @AllCharityRadio
@Tweetinggoddess @mariekeflament @AllCharityRadio Aw, but just heard my name mentioned! 5 mins prog left to listen to ;) Thanks!

Cheers Ken, your help @DojoCon very much appreciated :) Now on to @coolestprojects planning! Always something comin… https://t.co/4IF4XMc5ZZ
Looking forward to @DojoCon 2017 at @dojowarrington - best of luck to the team there! https://t.co/iYoyNZ2GeE
@SelectStores Brilliant thanks - will be a perfect Christmas present :) 🎁
@SelectStores Just wondering if you have the Fuel Food Cookbook in stock?
@OllysFarm @killruddery Ok thanks :)
@OllysFarm Just wondering if Thomas's in Foxrock might have them, would be a bit nearer for me! If not, no worries!
@OllysFarm @killruddery Oh excellent, thanks!
@OllysFarm Thanks, they look very nice! Can prob get to @killruddery - what price are they?
@OllysFarm Do you have any honey in Christmas packaging, such as a set of 3 small jars of honey?
Universities training the world's top coders. Russia, China & Vietnam lead the list: https://t.co/PUD8rEQooA https://t.co/gET7fqM4BS
@pietschj Thanks, will try there, Carrickmines only had GU10s!
The wonderful @VedaRestaurant has just gone above and beyond for me, not for the first time! Thanks guys, you're the best!
Curious about women who write Christmas cards from the family - do you sign your name first or your partner's? #UnconsciousBias
Can anyone tell me of a shop in south Dublin that definitely has Philips Hue bulbs in stock? Bayonet or screw-in type. TIA!
Thanks so much Luis, pleasure to meet you :) https://t.co/DewAlvQ8zw
Really enjoyed Forward @WebSummit last night, thanks to all involved :) One of my takeaways: Diversity = acceptance more so than inclusion
Great turnout for #DigiDL talk on scaling tech business, @AnthonyQuigley of @dl_bid opens meeting in #DunLaoghaire https://t.co/vtdswtgALr
@tweepsmap Found a little typo you might want to fix ;) #engagement https://t.co/i0OhrFW1A4
@pietschj Would have been much handier - I needed to see some stuff before buying though :( Madness is right!!
@mitchelloconnor A very happy birthday to your Dad, hope you're all having a lovely day!
Whew, just survived IKEA Dublin.1,000s of cranky people banging their trolleys into each other. Merry Christmas Eve… https://t.co/YrfhUVYJKN
@Shosey01 Bingo! And a new buyer (property fund?) will continue to let apartments @ sky high rates while people can't afford to buy homes :(
Why is #NAMA not selling these 54 new Dublin apartments rather than renting them out? https://t.co/R7sPgwsHcQ Planning on sale when all let?
@AerLingus Can't activate Aerclub a/c. Never had username before, your system says an email address to retrieve one… https://t.co/rKGFnOLo2C
And Virgin Media broadband is back in Cabinteely, just as I'm going to bed. Hope Daryll of @VirginMediaIE can go home soon ;)
@CompuspaceIE @VirginMediaIE And hopefully a day with high speed broadband - and plenty of it! Night night, thanks for the chat!
I wonder will there be a baby boom in 9 months time as a result of @VirginMediaIE outage? Their way of creating new customers perhaps ;)
@Shosey01 @CabinteelyLife @Macker81 @VirginMediaIE Thanks, think I might go read a book though!
@CompuspaceIE @VirginMediaIE I'd say he'll be using all his fingers a lot more than we'll be using our thumbs -the joys of customer service!
@_shan3k I'd post screenshots of my last @VirginMediaIE speed tests but they're on Dropbox, too much like hard work to root out on phone!
@CosmicLover_ Because we can't stream & tweet ;)
@_shan3k I think so!
@CompuspaceIE @VirginMediaIE Ya gotta sympathise. It isn't poor Daryll's fault. The social media people don't want unhappy customers ;)
Well Congrats @VirginMediaIE You're trending on Twitter. Unfortunately not for a good reason #VirginMedia https://t.co/xGCOFmiXFg
@beesandbombs Marvellous thanks to having a decent mobile data allowance. Otherwise would be shit out of luck! #VirginMedia
@VirginMediaIE You're in for a busy night Daryll! While I sympathise with you having to work tonight, I'm really fed up with Virgin Media.
Thank you! A solution for people affected by Virgin Media outage - https://t.co/KkLSNsXaGg
@CabinteelyLife @Macker81 @Shosey01 @VirginMediaIE Reckon we'll get a refund? Oh I forgot, they're upping their prices, so that's a no then!
Big problems with Virgin Media all around Ireland, it seems :( Over 1,600 reports! No news on @virginmedia… https://t.co/KQpRNZA1HO
@Macker81 @Shosey01 @VirginMediaIE For sure :(
.@Macker81 @Shosey01 @VirginMediaIE We are not alone! Have you seen this https://t.co/tMRr2IBn3Q #VirginMediaMeltdown
@Macker81 @Shosey01 @VirginMediaIE I wouldn't hold my breath ;)
@Dubl1nJo Yep. I miss the good old days of UPC. Will be looking at options from other providers. Bye bye @VirginMediaIE 👎
@Macker81 @Shosey01 @VirginMediaIE Where are you? I'm in Cabinteely. Thanking my lucky stars I've plenty of mobile data!
From what I can see on Twitter it seems to be a major outage :( https://t.co/OLM32mfb0Y
Anyone else in south Dublin whose @VirginMediaIE broadband is out of action tonight?

Andrew is a fantastic itch/presentation trainer, I know him a long time! https://t.co/mlgx3cs0PH
If you're in #DunLaoghaire area today, well worth popping in to the fab Christmas Fair at Johnstown Schools near Killiney Shopping Centre :)
@liamglasgow So glad to hear that. I hope you have support to turn to, don't be afraid to ask. Not your fault what happened. Stay strong x
The #LateLateToyShow is a bit like #reelingintheyears - as soon as you watch a minute of it, that's it - you're sucked in! Great show tonite
@_eileenoduffy For sure, would love to meet up over the next few weeks :)
@_eileenoduffy Saw you at #DigiDL today but you were talking to someone everytime I looked. Then you were gone! Sorry I missed you :(
Interesting van. Although I suspect this sort of finish is not going to catch on ;) https://t.co/1nvUw56fC5
@ScullyMark You're welcome :)
@ScullyMark Glad to report this afternoon's panel 50/50 female https://t.co/3wwixAq7WI
@ScullyMark I believe we have ladies this afternoon. Will be upset if not!

@Aisling_Pash @guardian_sport @OwenJones84 @guardian Don't hold much hope tho, new tweet "Me and santa both got the sack at christmas ha ha"
@Aisling_Pash @guardian_sport @OwenJones84 @guardian Well I hope he gets himself educated & then informs the idiots who support his view.
@Aisling_Pash @guardian_sport @OwenJones84 @guardian Glad they were quick about it. So sad reading tweets by people affected by child abuse.
@liamglasgow Wow, how horrendous for you. Please don't let a fool like @ericbristow into your head. I wish you well.
Saw those shocking tweets last night; I see they're gone now, not even an attempt at an apology. Victim blaming nev… https://t.co/OwHpSD7b8b
600 jobs announced at two Dublin tech companies https://t.co/LKDfwZAaN2 via @rte
@VirginMediaIE Thanks. Husband told we would have to be in same place, i.e. 1 person has to miss work so we could call you. Ridiculous!
@VirginMediaIE Thank you. Would really appreciate if you could let telephone support people know as they don't seem to have a clue about it!
@VirginMediaIE How does my husband get my name on a/c (again) when he works long hours & not near me in daytime? Cust svc so frustrating :(
#jobfairy @coolestprojects is looking for a General Manager - details here: https://t.co/gjmXWnXflb
@philipnolan1 Indeed. I still remember Seamus at closing time "Have yiz no homes to go to?!". Lovely man, will be much missed.
@DPD_UK Think I probably tagged the wrong Twitter account with my tweet? Driver in Dublin last wk doing absolutely… https://t.co/eued6ELa76
